speaker: SPEAKER_00
text: I walked in the recruiter's office and he looked at me and he said "You're fat and you're black.

speaker: SPEAKER_00
text: I said I wanted to be a Navy SEAL. He laughed at me. He said I basically had to lose 106 pounds in less than three months. Roger that. I got my chocolate milkshake and walked out. I sat there and I had time to reflect back on my life. I knew that no one was coming back to help me. I had to invent a guy that can take any pain, any suffering, any kind of judgment

speaker: SPEAKER_00
text: It's time to be a Navy SEAL. I get my shoes on and I run a quarter mile. Come home crying. I start realizing I can't run that far. If I'm not good enough, I'm gonna make myself good enough. I developed a psychotic weight routine. I was just doing two, three hundred reps, four hundred reps. I'm gonna go out here and put everything on David Goggins to be a Navy SEAL. I came back three months later, 106 pounds lighter.

speaker: SPEAKER_00
text: Often referred to as the hardest mother on planet earth.
